<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// CCState - This class holds information needed while lowering arguments and</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ByValInfo and SmallVector&lt;ByValInfo, 4&gt; ByValRegs:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Vector of ByValInfo instances (ByValRegs) is introduced for byval registers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// tracking.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Or, in another words it tracks byval parameters that are stored in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// general purpose registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For 4 byte stack alignment,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instance index means byval parameter number in formal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// arguments set. Assume, we have some &quot;struct&#95;type&quot; with size = 4 bytes,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then, for function &quot;foo&quot;:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// i32 foo(i32 %p, %struct&#95;type&#42; %r, i32 %s, %struct&#95;type&#42; %t)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ByValRegs&#91;0&#93; describes how &quot;%r&quot; is stored (Begin == r1, End == r2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ByValRegs&#91;1&#93; describes how &quot;%t&quot; is stored (Begin == r3, End == r4).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In case of 8 bytes stack alignment,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In function shown above, r3 would be wasted according to AAPCS rules.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ByValRegs vector size still would be 2,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// while &quot;%t&quot; goes to the stack: it wouldn&#39;t be described in ByValRegs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Supposed use-case for this collection:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 Initially ByValRegs is empty, InRegsParamsProcessed is 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 HandleByVal fills up ByValRegs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3 Argument analysis (LowerFormatArguments, for example). After</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// some byval argument was analyzed, InRegsParamsProcessed is increased.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">ByValInfo &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ByValInfo(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>) : Begin(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>), End(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First register allocated for current parameter.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Begin;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First after last register allocated for current parameter.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> End;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;ByValInfo, 4 &gt;</a> ByValRegs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// InRegsParamsProcessed - shows how many instances of ByValRegs was proceed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// during argument analysis.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InRegsParamsProcessed;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Attempt to allocate a block of RegsRequired consecutive registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If this is not possible, return an empty range. Otherwise, return a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// range of consecutive registers, marking the entire block as allocated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate/#a80596370c938add79f4045e0dfe08a4d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;MCPhysReg&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate/#a80596370c938add79f4045e0dfe08a4d">AllocateRegBlock</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;MCPhysReg&gt;</a> Regs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RegsRequired) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RegsRequired &gt; Regs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StartIdx = 0; StartIdx &lt;= Regs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>() - RegsRequired;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">         ++StartIdx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BlockAvailable = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for already-allocated regs in this block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BlockIdx = 0; BlockIdx &lt; RegsRequired; ++BlockIdx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate/#ae175b31af8d3499f652b5658c385af9c">isAllocated</a>(Regs&#91;StartIdx + BlockIdx&#93;)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">          BlockAvailable = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BlockAvailable) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mark the entire block as allocated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BlockIdx = 0; BlockIdx &lt; RegsRequired; ++BlockIdx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MarkAllocated(Regs&#91;StartIdx + BlockIdx&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Regs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#aebf6ca7590d4f766b894044015a0fa31">slice</a>(StartIdx, RegsRequired);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No block was available</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
